articles.author: Christian Shepherd, Lyric Li
articles.title: China opens huge port in Peru to extend its reach in Latin America - The Washington Post
articles.description: The port opening in Chancay underscores China’s growing clout in a region that once looked primarily to the United States for economic opportunity.
articles.content: Chinese leader Xi Jinping and Peruvian president Dina Boluarte on Thursday inaugurated a huge port in the Peruvian city of Chancay, celebrating an infrastructure project that is expected to attract $… [+6179 chars]

articles.author: Colin Laidley
articles.title: Buffett's Berkshire Buys Shares of Domino's Pizza and Pool Corp., Dumps Apple Stock - Investopedia
articles.description: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway took stakes in Domino's Pizza and swimming pool supplier Pool Corp. in the third quarter while continuing to trim stakes in longtime holdings Apple and Bank of America.
articles.content: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway (BRK.A; BRK.B) took stakes in Domino's Pizza (DPZ) and swimming pool supplier Pool Corp. (POOL) in the third quarter while continuing to trim stakes in longtime ho… [+2146 chars]

articles.title: Eva Longoria says her family no longer lives in 'dystopian' US - BBC.com
articles.description: The Desperate Housewives star acknowledged most Americans were not as "privileged" to "get to escape".
articles.content:
Hollywood actress Eva Longoria has revealed that her family no longer lives in the United States, and is splitting time between Mexico and Spain.
